title: Content-based Image Retrieval

Industry Applications
e-commerce search, stock photo platforms, medical imaging, forensic analysis, art history research, fashion search, reverse image search, copyright detection, product discovery, visual shopping, museum collections, digital asset management
Associated Models
convolutional neural networks, CLIP, ResNet features
Domain Terminology
visual similarity, feature extraction, visual search, image similarity, perceptual hashing, visual features, image embeddings

title: Document Retrieval
details:
Select document related to the query

Industry Applications
legal research, academic research, customer support, knowledge management, enterprise search, medical literature, patent search, compliance documents, technical documentation, regulatory research, due diligence, case law research
Associated Models
information retrieval, semantic search, vector search, TF-IDF, BM25, dense retrieval
Domain Terminology
relevance ranking, search quality, precision and recall, retrieval evaluation, query matching

data.query: Identify remedy procedures for compliance violations in financial institutions.
documents: Financial institutions must implement remediation procedures that include customer notification, adjustments to impacted accounts, and reporting to regulators within required timelines.
Compliance violations tied to anti-money laundering regulations require escalation to the chief compliance officer for review and potential suspicious activity reporting.
Operational handbooks outline branch opening procedures and staffing checklists but do not cover compliance remediation workflows.

data.left: Look at this! It's a brand new product.
data.right: Look at this! It's an awesome piece of sh*t.

data.query: Which is the biggest black hole in the universe?
